70-beakon.title: 70 Beakon
70-beakon.description: Barbaric birds that attack twice with deadly drumsticks and cry cacophonously to creep out foes and call forth friends.

apeckalypse.title: Apeckalypse
apeckalypse.description: Blighted birds that live on poisonous plants. They frighten foes with

belisha-beakon.title: Belisha Beakon
belisha-beakon.description: Their whirlwind speed allows them to attack twice per turn, wards off wind spells and makes them masters of

bird-of-terrordise.title: Bird Of Terrordise
bird-of-terrordise.description: Brutish birds that bring things to a boil with their burning breath, and drive enemies dotty with Kafuddle.
bird-of-terrordise.secondaryDescription: Supposedly named after world champion strongman Terry Terrordise, who is said to have discovered them on his travels.

drackmage.title: Drackmage
drackmage.description: Green, forest-dwelling drackies who deftly dodge attacks, then strike back with

dracky.title: Dracky
dracky.description: These bat-like beasts like nothing better than to gang up and go gallavanting across the night skies.
dracky.secondaryDescription: They have crazy cousins called wackies and boastful brothers called brackies. They long to go freckly and beâ€¦frackies.

ailmentAffinities: 25% resistance to Sleep. Immune to Fizzle.

fowleye.title: Fowleye
fowleye.description: His evil eyes bring calamity wherever their gaze falls. When not fighting, he keeps them closed and feigns friendliness.
fowleye.secondaryDescription: An unbelievable evil who feasts on the souls of the weak to feed the dour power that resides in his almighty eyes.
